sessions.title: Building Production LLMs with Amazon Bedrock
sessions.description: Deploy large language models at scale using Amazon Bedrock. Learn prompt engineering, fine-tuning strategies, guardrails implementation, and cost optimization for generative AI workloads.
speakers: Dr. Emily Chen, Principal ML Scientist, AWS AI

sessions.title: Real-Time ML with Amazon SageMaker Feature Store
sessions.description: Build real-time machine learning pipelines with SageMaker Feature Store. Explore feature engineering, online/offline stores, feature freshness, and sub-10ms latency serving.
speakers: Raj Kumar, Sr. ML Solutions Architect, AWS

sessions.title: Recommendation Systems at Scale with AWS
sessions.description: Design high-performance recommendation engines using Amazon Personalize and SageMaker. Learn collaborative filtering, deep learning models, real-time personalization, and A/B testing strategies.

sessions.title: Streaming Data Pipelines with Amazon Kinesis
sessions.description: Process millions of events per second with Amazon Kinesis. Explore stream processing patterns, windowing functions, exactly-once semantics, and integration with ML inference endpoints.
speakers: Sarah Mitchell, Streaming Analytics Architect, AWS

sessions.title: MLOps: Automating ML Lifecycle with SageMaker Pipelines
sessions.description: Implement end-to-end MLOps with SageMaker Pipelines. Learn CI/CD for ML models, automated retraining, model monitoring, drift detection, and feature store integration.

sessions.title: Generative AI for Content Creation and Personalization
sessions.description: Build generative AI applications for marketing and advertising. Explore text generation, image synthesis with Stable Diffusion, video generation, and ethical AI considerations.
speakers: Lisa Wang, AI Research Scientist, AWS
Alex Thompson, Generative AI Specialist, AWS

sessions.title: Amazon Aurora: Global Database at Scale
sessions.description: Build globally distributed databases with Amazon Aurora. Learn about Aurora Global Database, read replicas, failover strategies, and performance tuning for multi-region applications.

sessions.title: Vector Databases for LLM Applications with pgvector
sessions.description: Build semantic search and RAG applications using pgvector on Amazon RDS and Aurora. Learn embedding generation, similarity search, indexing strategies, and hybrid search patterns.
speakers: Michael Rodriguez, Database ML Specialist, AWS

sessions.title: GPU Optimization for Deep Learning on Amazon EC2
sessions.description: Maximize GPU utilization for deep learning workloads. Explore P5 instances, NVIDIA H100 optimization, multi-GPU training, distributed training with PyTorch FSDP, and cost management.
speakers: Jennifer Lee, HPC & ML Infrastructure Lead, AWS

sessions.title: Click-Through Rate Prediction with Amazon SageMaker
sessions.description: Build high-performance CTR prediction models for advertising platforms. Learn feature engineering for sparse data, deep learning architectures (Wide & Deep, DeepFM), and real-time inference optimization.

sessions.title: Real-Time Analytics with Amazon Redshift Streaming
sessions.description: Query streaming data with zero-ETL using Redshift streaming ingestion. Learn materialized views, incremental refresh strategies, and sub-second analytics on live data.
speakers: Robert Taylor, Analytics Solutions Architect, AWS

sessions.title: Responsible AI: Bias Detection and Model Explainability
sessions.description: Build trustworthy ML systems with SageMaker Clarify and Responsible AI tools. Explore bias detection, fairness metrics, SHAP explanations, model cards, and governance frameworks.
speakers: Dr. Amanda Foster, AI Ethics Lead, AWS
Kevin Chen, ML Governance Specialist, AWS
